scripts.build: yarn install && cd packages/common && yarn run build && cd ../homescreen && yarn build && cd ../quiz-creator && yarn build && cd ../presentation && yarn build && cd ../response && yarn build
scripts.dev-server: yarn run build && cd ./dev-server && npm start
scripts.presentation: cd packages/presentation && yarn build && cd ../../dev-server && npm start
scripts.response: cd packages/response && yarn build && cd ../../dev-server && npm start
